nodes.bodyText: Since all primitives are handled here now, you could just return type.asPrimitiveType().primitive() instead couldn't you?  Or even just return true perhaps?

nodes.bodyText: I just noticed that OptionalInt/OptionalLong/OptionalDouble are missing from this list.  Might be worth fixing now or later.
Sure. I'll do it in a separate PR.
